en.Slide 1: Now, We will examine the best case cost.
en.Slide 2: The best case of insertion sort occurs when the array values are in sorted order from lowest to highest as shown
en.Slide 3: Every test in the inner for loop will fail immediately and no values will be moved
en.Slide 4: The total number of comparisons will be $n-1$ which is the number of times the outer for loop executes
en.Slide 5: And therefore, the best case running time of insertion sort is $\theta(n)$
